scripts.test-tdd: rm -rf dist && chokidar src/{,**/}*.ts --initial -c 'tsc --project tsconfig.json && clear && jasmine --reporter=jasmine-ts-console-reporter dist/{,**/}*.spec.js' -d 100
scripts.test-debug: rm -rf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.json && node --inspect-brk ./node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js dist/{,**/}*.spec.js
